page.title: 20CREDITS; ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS.
page.content:
Our thanks go to Mr. David Rudd who organized the whole of our part in the Domesday Project.
Thanks to those Scouts who took part in the hike where the information for this report was collected _ Martin Rudd, Philip Rudd, and Stefan Chiffers.
We are especially grateful to Mrs. Susan Pettit who supplied us with the notes on Penponds Farm (Pages 14-19).
What about Tom Rouncefield who has worn his fingers out, typing all of this report ?!! _____ The Scouts of 13th Troop Truro (St. Paul's) hope you will find this survey useful, especially for posterity.
